sourcesContent:
import { extendTheme } from '@chakra-ui/react';

const theme = extendTheme({
  colors: {
    black: "#252525",
    body: "#d5e1e1",
    global: "#fff",
    hoverBorder: "#fff5da",
    lightColor: "#FFF5DA",
    ltColorBackgroundDark: "#dee3ed",
    ltColorBackgroundDefault: "#f1f3f9",
    ltColorBackgroundLight: "#f8f9fc",
    ltColorBlack: "#111213",
    ltColorBorderDark: "#c2c9d6",
    ltColorBorderDefault: "#dee3ed",
    ltColorBorderLight: "#f1f3f9",
    ltColorGray100: "#f8f9fc",
    ltColorGray200: "#f1f3f9",
    ltColorGray300: "#dee3ed",
    ltColorGray400: "#c2c9d6",
    ltColorGray500: "#8f96a3",
    ltColorGray600: "#5e636e",
    ltColorGray700: "#2f3237",
    ltColorGray800: "#1d1e20",
    ltColorGray900: "#111213",
    ltColorOverlayDark: "#fff",
    ltColorOverlayDefault: "#fff",
    ltColorOverlayTransparent: "rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)",
    ltColorTextDark: "#1d1e20",
    ltColorTextDefault: "#2f3237",
    ltColorTextLight: "#5e636e",
    ltColorTextVeryLight: "#8f96a3",
    ltColorTransparent: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)",
    ltColorWhite: "#fff",
    ltShadowWebsiteOverlay: "0 0 7px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)",
    ltShadowActive: "0 0 8px -2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 6px 20px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)",
    ltShadowDefault: "0 2px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.16), 0 1px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04)",
    outlineColor: "#000",
    talkTagColor: "rgba(37, 37, 37, 0.30)",
    whiteColor: "#ffffff",
  },
  fonts: {
    body: "'Whyte', sans-serif", // Beispiel für die Schriftart
  },
  space: {
    padding: "24px", // Beispiel für den Padding-Wert
    margin: "24px", // Beispiel für den Margin-Wert
  },
});

export default theme;
